definition: fragrant/sweet smelling/aromatic/savory or appetizing/(to eat) with relish/(of sleep) sound/perfume or spice/joss or incense stick/CL:根[gen1]
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

sentences.english: The Rapel Valley weather ripened fruit slowly , and Cabernet Sauvignon developed intense flavours.
sentences.chinese: 蘭佩谷的氣候使得葡萄成熟緩慢，並帶有濃郁的香氣。
魚餌香氣四溢，味道鮮美。

sentences.english: It's aroma refreshing, light yellow liquor color, taste comfortable it is best in white tea.
sentences.chinese: 其香氣清新，湯色淡黃，滋味鮮爽，是白茶中的極品。

sentences.english: Full-bodied and structured with a very strong aroma.
sentences.chinese: 飽滿的酒體，很強烈的香氣。

sentences.english: With flavor and aroma of baking, after drinking halls.
sentences.chinese: 帶焙火的韻味與香氣，飲後令人回味無窮。

sentences.english: A new method was used to distinguish the aroma of France Rhodia sandalwood series.
sentences.chinese: 應用一種新方法來區別法國羅地亞檀香系列的香氣。

sentences.english: Yellow colour of straw. Apricot nose with mineral aromas.
sentences.chinese: 草黃色，有杏的香氣並夾雜着礦物質的味道。

sentences.english: Bouquet: Excellent concentration. Berry nose with vanilla flavours and complex oakiness.
sentences.chinese: 濃醇度，芳香帶濃厚果味，有香料和煙的香氣。

sentences.english: In the popular and the young white wines, you can find the aroma of fermentation.
sentences.chinese: 在流行且淺齡的白葡萄酒裏，你可以找到發酵的香氣。

sentences.english: They saw Longjing tea is pure and fragrant and has a sweetish and mellow taste.
sentences.chinese: 他們認爲龍井茶色澤翠綠，香氣馥郁，甘醇爽口。

sentences.english: The aroma is a complex mix of blackcurrant with liquor ice and violets with hints of a cigar box.
sentences.chinese: 香氣是一種混合黑醋栗帶有紫羅蘭和雪茄盒子的感覺。

sentences.english: All the time, he savoured the gillyflowers in full bloom under my windows.
sentences.chinese: 他一直聞着盛開在我窗下的紫羅蘭花香氣。

sentences.english: Jasmine unique formula, smell fresh, light and pleasant aroma Heart.
sentences.chinese: 獨特茉莉花配方，氣味清爽，淡淡香氣怡人心脾。

sentences.english: TASTING NOTES : Aromas of thyme, rosemary and other herbs typical of the "garrigue"(Mediterranean scrubland) can be detected in the bouquet.
sentences.chinese: 氣味帶有百里香，迷失香和地中海灌木叢香氣。

sentences.english: Sandalwood folding fans with quiet elegance and delicate fragrance give ladies real enjoyment.
sentences.chinese: 檀香摺扇香氣淡雅清鬱，真正貴婦享受。

sentences.english: Scented with the refreshing aroma of organic Bergamot essential oil.
sentences.chinese: 有機佛手柑精油的香氣令人有清爽之感。
